Name: Sneezy
Description: Using any piece of equipment will|reroll a random dice.
Rule Change: Rules.addextrascript(~if(getstatusself(\~helium\~) == 0){var availdice = []; for (mydice in self.dicepool){ if (mydice.available() && !mydice.intween()){ availdice.push(mydice); } } if(availdice.length > 0) { shuffle(availdice); availdice[0].animatereroll(rand([1[;]2[;]3[;]4[;]5[;]6]) | self.screenposition());  };};~[;] ~playerequipmentuse~);
